ygData.subject: Re: Specialization
ygData.msgSnippet: Fear not my brother! I find that the best groups are wizard heavy.  I adventured last night with a group that had 4 wizards (20th, 17th(me), 16th, and 16th) 1
ygData.messageBody:
Fear not my brother! I find that the best groups are wizard heavy. I
adventured last night with a group that had 4 wizards (20th, 17th(me), 16th,
and 16th) 1 monk(15th), and 1 paladin(16th). We were hunting orcs in
highpass hold. Hardly anyone got hurt because the targets were dead before
they could do any real damage. We were hunting things that were at least
blue to the 20th level person and everyone was being effective. I did get
resisted a few times by some of the higher level mobs but nothing too crazy
and no one ever came close to dying. Plus we all got a bunch of experience
even the 15th level guy who made 16th.

BTW, I found half a page of a Grimoire and 1 words from the orcs there. I
also bought a rune from the Paladin in our group who looted it. I think
they were alocytes and medics and scouts we got them from.

-- Elidain, now 18th level Wizard on Veeshan
